include.name: Showcase_List_Content
include.visible: Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(years) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(genres) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(artists) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(videofiles)

control.visible: Container.Content(movies) + Control.IsVisible(57) + !Control.HasFocus(70197) + [Control.IsVisible(109) | Control.HasFocus(70110) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoon) | [[ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7011).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7020).HasFocus()] + [Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfotrigger) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoauto)]]]

!IsEmpty(ListItem.Trailer) + Skin.HasSetting(showcasetrailer) + Player.HasVideo + Control.IsVisible(57) + !Control.HasFocus(70197) + [Control.IsVisible(109) | Control.HasFocus(70110) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoon) | [ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus() + Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfotrigger)]]

Container.Content(movies) + Control.IsVisible(57) + !Control.HasFocus(70197) + [Control.IsVisible(109) | Control.HasFocus(70110) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoon) | [[ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7011).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7020).HasFocus()] + [Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfotrigger) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoauto)]]]

Container.Content(movies) + Control.IsVisible(57) + !Control.HasFocus(70197) + [Control.IsVisible(109) | Control.HasFocus(70110) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoon) | [[ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7011).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7020).HasFocus()] + [Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfotrigger) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoauto)]]]

Skin.HasSetting(videotv) + Control.IsVisible(57) + !Control.HasFocus(70197) + [Control.IsVisible(109) | Control.HasFocus(70110) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasetvinfoon) | [[ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7011).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7020).HasFocus()] + [Skin.HasSetting(showcasetvinfotrigger) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasetvinfoauto)]]]

Control.IsVisible(57) + !Control.HasFocus(70197) + [Control.IsVisible(109) | Control.HasFocus(70110) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasemusicinfoon) | [[ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7011).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(7020).HasFocus()] + [Skin.HasSetting(showcasemusicinfotrigger) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasemusicinfoauto)]]]

include.name: ShowcaseSquare

control.visible: Control.IsVisible(57) + Container.OnNext + ![[[Skin.HasSetting(flattenshowcasemovies) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies)] | [Skin.HasSetting(flattenshowcasetv) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] | [!Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + !Window.IsActive(videofiles) + Skin.HasSetting(flattenshowcasemusic)]] | Container.Content(episodes)]

Control.IsVisible(57) + Container.OnPrevious + ![[[Skin.HasSetting(flattenshowcasemovies) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies)] | [Skin.HasSetting(flattenshowcasetv) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] | [!Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + !Window.IsActive(videofiles) + Skin.HasSetting(flattenshowcasemusic)]] | Container.Content(episodes)]

control.visible: [[Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfotrigger) | [Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoauto) + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Trailer) + Control.IsVisible(109)] | [Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoon) + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Trailer)]] + Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies)] | [[Skin.HasSetting(showcasetvinfotrigger) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasetvinfoauto)] + Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] | [Skin.HasSetting(showcasemusicinfotrigger) + Window.IsActive(musiclibrary)]

[![Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfotrigger) | [Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoauto) + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Trailer) + Control.IsVisible(109)] | [Skin.HasSetting(showcaseinfoon) + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Trailer)]] + Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies)] | [![Skin.HasSetting(showcasetvinfotrigger) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasetvinfoauto)] + Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(showcasemusicinfotrigger) + Window.IsActive(musiclibrary)]
